stories.original_headline: Male bonobos use hidden clues to boost mating success
stories.original_summary: Male bonobos have an impressive ability to detect when females are most fertile, even though the usual visual cues are unreliable. stories.fantasy_headline: Forest Bonobos Unravel Secret Signs to Find Suitable Mates
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards of the Wilds have observed the clever bonobos deep in the jungle. These male creatures possess a mystical knack for sensing when females are most ready to form new bonds, even when common signs are hidden. They combine ancient timing knowledge with a female's lineage to choose wisely.

stories.original_headline: Absynth is back and weirder than ever after 16 years
stories.original_summary: Absynth is something of a cult classic in the soft synth world. It was originally released in 2000, and quickly found an audience among the growing cadre of people making music on computers. stories.fantasy_headline: The Whispering Synth Awakens After Years of Slumber!
stories.fantasy_story: For sixteen years, the beloved Whispering Synth, a relic of the Artificers' Guild of Nocturne, lay silent. Once, many bards crafted enchanting melodies with its arcane power, but it was lost to time. Now, the ancient artifact has reawakened, capable of conjuring stranger and more wondrous harmonies than ever before.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Oracle Slab: Trials and Triumphs of a Grand Enchantment
stories.fantasy_story: By the Age of Progress, the Oracle Slab was transforming the realms. These personal scrying slabs, though still crude in their early form, offered wonders like duplicating runes. The Clan of the Golden Apple faced great trials, but their powerful artifacts were clearly set to change the very fabric of daily life.
